data.text: I've gotta rate this app 5 stars. I first installed it on my tablet and seen immediate improvement. Baseball is starting and I was streaming the game on my phone, and I use Verizon, Samsung. The best streaming there is. Never had issues in all the years I've streamed games all season, and all year round, until today. If Verizon samsung starts lagging, you know something is wrong. After having success with this app on my tablet I figured it was worth a shot. Immediate improvement once again.

It's one of those apps that work. Kt doesn't interrupt you in the middle of your phone conversation or some show you may be watching. I like this app because it's simple and fast. It does what is created to do and nothing more or less. And you're phone has added security as well as more space for storage that you need and not the rubbish of duplicate files of junk. Thanks . Q

The ads are worth the service. Cleaned my phone up in 20 min and can track the electric current through the battery monitor in real time. They could make it easier to cancel the ads when the time runs out though, kinda forces ya to see or accidentally click other stuff. So -1 for deceitful ads. Also like the anti virus page ironically having a trojan virus style ad in the result page. Saying Warning! Use it then uninstall

At first I gave it a 5 star. You do have to watch a good amount of ad's. I take it back I've noticed the WiFi network scan and test parts have issues. There's days it has glitches and loads slow. It feels like it takes a while to get through all the parts. It's worth it to me if it works correctly. I really love that it's all in one though.
data.replyText: Sorry for the trouble! Could you please contact us to the mail getoratools@gmail.com? Some details of the issue will be very helpful for troubleshooting. Thanks!

data.text: Fast, reliable, a lot of options to be able to do to clean out your phone. Free. There is an option to buying better if you want to pay for it. I think it's free one works perfectly fine it's fast fast. I think it's a very good app and it should be used by people. I forgot to mention it is also antivirus cleaner too so it cleans your phone and checks for viruses Love it

Just looking for an app to clean junk, boost phone and scan for viruses and spy ware. This app has way too many adds. Also it is apparently downloading games on its own. It is the only recent app i have added and after trying to use it just once or twice through the aggregation of adds i found 3 games i didn't want nor did i go to my app store and download. Terrible, stay away!

I understand that free apps are gonna have ads. It's the trade-off. I also get it when you can not exit the ad for a set amount of time. It's a free app. They gotta make money. Ora Clean seems like a great app. But all the ads trick you by showing the big white X , but instead of taking you back to the app to finish what you were doing, it takes you to the ads download page in Google Play. Push back button? You are back at the ad again. Push X? You guessed it. Play store. Very very frustrating.

Upgraded to 5 stars, once I found the option to upgrade virus scanning capability. The best app which includes cleaning, virus scanning and many other features for free. I don't mind waiting for the videos, as they are quick. It's a symbiotic transaction for certain!

If'n you like getting bombarded by numerous ads every time you run a scan, this is probably a great app. As for me, I'm done with it, after running two scans. I be try to find one with less ads for stuff I have no intention to download or purchase.

Five stars it really clean my storage thank you so much it clean 1GB and is really alot You're the first one that really helped my storage way faster and I'm really looking forward to it in the future of you're updateds and is very easy to use and there's not much ads I don't know why there's people complaining is very rear to see ads.üíõ

I could my phone to stop with a 100000 notifications every second on the second I was getting them 24/7. My phones screen shows this (your UI isn't responding and it flashes and won't let me do anythingx at anytime day or night I get a white square box and writn inside it says.( UI isn't responding and please try again later won't let me do much of anything. Now this isn't normal. Right!

So far, it seems to be a very good app. But it's not finding much to clean bc I already have an app for that. First thing it does is ask for a credit card. But when I refused they went ahead and went to work anyway, to show me what they could do. And they kept at it . So, yes, I'm impressed. If you have storage problems this is the app to get. It's very thorough, even without a credit card. Lol . Thanks guys, you're appreciated!

Way too, too, too many ads. Another ad pops up when try to run anything in this app. Then have to close just to rid the ad. Then when open again, another ad pops up instead of this app. I know ads are needed for developers money, but this many ads are ridiculous. Uninstall now.

I'm actually conflicted between AVG which is very efficient with speedtest and firewall capabilities, this app is definitely worth a try, love the lay out very accessible, it's easier to understand. Yes, there are ads but nit unbearable

Comparison: I've tried several apps over the years, freebies and paid subscriptions. I'm very pleased to say Ora Clean (the freebie option) has proved to hold it's own and then some, in a flooded market of technology protections. It has saved my electronics more than once when it was secretly invaded by nasty virus's. And it has kept them running better than expected as my electronic guard dog protecting it's territory against any and all invaders! I give it a 10+, and highly recommend itüëç
It's been keeping my phone free & clear of virus's & blocking Spam nonsense! It's also cleaned up some of my past problems with virus's on my phone! It works great!
